cu.explanation_en: Setting the local SCTP port to 99999 exceeds the valid port range, causing SCTP binding failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting downlink frequency band to 999 exceeds the valid band range, causing frequency configuration failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將下行頻率頻帶設定為 999 超過有效頻帶範圍，會導致頻率配置失敗。
